resources.string: This phone application uses the enhanced notifications API to display recipe instructions using paged notifications. After starting the application on your phone, you can browse from a short list of recipes and select one to view. Each recipe is broken down into a number of steps; when ready, you can click on the START action in the action bar to send the steps to the wearable. On the wearable device, the steps are displayed as a multi-page notification, with one page for each step in the recipe.
